properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana pokea
sadaka tunayokutolea.
Mkate divai
na fedha ni mali yako.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana pokea mazao
tunayokutolea.
Ni tunda la jasho
letu sisi wanao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bwana pokea
na fedha tunazokutolea.
Ni tunda la kazi
zetu tuzifanyazo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana pokea vipaji,
shukrani kwako wewe.
Umetukomboa
Bwana tuko maliyo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nazo nyoyo zetu
Baba uzipokee sasa.
Nazo nafsi zetu
zote twazitolea.
